pathFinder.noPathFound: No valid path found from {start} to {end}{avoidText}
pathFinder.noPathFoundTip: No valid path found from {start} to {end}{avoidText}

nlpPathFinder.calculateRouteFirst: Please calculate a route first using the "Shortest Route" tab
nlpPathFinder.initialMessage:
I see you have calculated a route: {route}
Total distance: {distance} km

You can ask me about:
* Interesting places to visit along your route
* Local attractions and hidden spots
* Restaurant recommendations
* The best times to visit each location
* Or any other travel tips you'd like to know!

map.routeDensityDescription: Adjust how many alternative routes are available between locations. Higher values create more route options but may make the map busier.
map.confirmRemoveAll: Are you sure you want to remove all nodes? This action cannot be undone.
map.errorRemovingAll: Error removing all nodes. Please try again.
